name: Manx TT Superbike
summary: Strap on your helmet and get ready to race some of the world's fastest motorcycles in MANX TT: SuperBike. Choose your ride from one of eight different TT bikes including three SuperBikes. Before hitting the track, you'll select an automatic or six-speed manual transmission. Once you've made all the necessary decisions, try to master the twists and turns of four unique tracks. When you can destroy the computer-controlled opposition, challenge your friends to a race and establish who is a true racing master. Stay on your bike and off of the pavement in MANX TT: SuperBike.
